text: The Chicago Red Hots is an amateur roller derby team based in Cicero, Illinois, United States. The club is affiliated with USA Roller Sports under the US Olympic Committee.Sandalow, Brian (May 23, 2014). "International Roller Derby Coming to Cicero" , Chicago Sun-Times. Retrieved April 13, 2015.Parrella-Aureli, Ariel; Sterba, Gretchen (April 22, 2016). "Roller Derby Girls Jam Back to the Top", Columbia Chronicle. Retrieved May 31, 2017. It was founded on December 11, 2012 by Dakota Prosch (formerly known as Kola Loka), Danielle Henderson (formerly known as Dani GYG) and Fernando Regueiro.About the Chicago Red Hots ==References== == External links == * Red Hots Category:Roller derby leagues in Illinois
title: Chicago Red Hots
